name: SolarWinds Network Topology Mapper Map
summary: An SNTM file is a network map created by SolarWinds Network Topology Mapper, an application for managing LAN and WAN networks. It contains a network configuration based on a scan, including nodes connected to a network and their performance analytics.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: SNTM file open in SolarWinds Network Topology Mapper 2
images.alt: SNTM file open in SolarWinds Network Topology Mapper 2
